name: Steppingstone Management Services
overview:
Steppingstone is a Chennai based headhunting and consulting firm. As we know the value of high performance work force, we handpick every candidate with utmost care so that the profile matches the company’s requirement.

The candidates are reached by us based on the company’s requirement based on Industry, skill set and experience using innovative means.

We help companies reduce the turnaround time and the effort associated with recruitment process. We take up the cumbersome and time-consuming tasks such as evaluating every candidate for the role. We screen the candidates thoroughly using innovative means focusing on the requirements of the company, industry and competencies needed for the role.

In addition to being a recruitment partner, we also take a step forward to collaborate with our customers/clients to enhance the quality and productivity of their processes by imparting training and other consulting services.
